song.eTitle: I Am Trusting Thee, Lord Jesus

verses.verse: I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus, Trusting only Thee! Trusting Thee for full salvation, Great and free.
I am trusting Thee for pardon, At Thy feet I bow; For Thy grace and tender mercy, Trusting now.
I am trusting Thee to guide me; Thou alone shalt lead, Everyday in our supplying All my need
I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus, Never let me fall; I am trusting Thee forever, And for all.
